rComments: The class was Gender & Global Cinema. This class was super easy, there is weekly reading summaries due but he didn't collect them until the end of the quarter. That was the extent of the class workload. The films and topics discussed really opened my eyes and were very interesting though.
Easiest class ever. Kind of boring but is an easy grader and likes to always hear students opinions

It's a film class so one lecture we'd watch a film and the next lecture we'd discuss the film & the readings he assigned to us (make sure to read or else you'd get lost). Grade was 50% summaries on the readings (about 13 articles assigned online) and 50% final paper (no exams!). I barely showed up but kept up with readings and the films, got an A.
